column5: The weather guys got something messed up today!! It is absolutely Teaming down rain here in Hamilton!  Gerritt.
coming here in oakville right now!  the radar looks like its going to be a fast one though!  be safe all!  Cheers!
Just starting to rumble here in Thorold.
OK now its raining and windy!  Gonna batten down the hatch!!!

don't mess with mother nature,,,,just barley got off the lake in time before it whipped up,,,was like a hurricane winds trying to get the boat allcovered up,,whew,,,just walked in the door,,,like gerrit said,,,weather man called for 30% chance of percipitation,,hmm

this time of year and with all the humdity we have had the last few days its no surprise.  strong wind coming over the great lakes can produce small little cells like this in no time.  Glad you made it back to shore safely.  Cheers!
I watched it come down and thought, dang, it wasn't suppose to do that...  Glad you made it back in safely Sonny, sorry I couldn't get out with you tonight...    Cheers Jen

It came through here around 10, If my buddy is was on schedule he would have been in the middle of L.O. headed for one of the 1000 isl. about a half hour ahead of it with just enough time to get ashore pitch a tent and watch it blow away.  If he was ahead of schedule and I think he was he might still have a tent if he got enough beer in it to hold it down..  If he was behind schedule, hopefully he's home in bed and leaving in the  morning.
